nodes.text: Shullis Khamarr was a female and the Minister of Logistics for the Sith Empire during the Great Galactic War as late as 3643 BBY.

Minister Khamarr was a female individual in the Sith Empire as the leader of the Ministry of Logistics. Khamarr was a favored minister of the Dark Council, the Empire's governing body, and she made it her priority to serve the needs of those on the planet of Dromund Kaas, the Sith capital. During the Great Galactic War, the Sith Lord Darth Malgus led an attack on the planet Ord Radama, and the Ministry of Logistics was responsible for resupplying his forces. However, the supplies never arrived and Malgus lacked sufficient influence over Khamarr to compel her to help him.

Along with her friend Ula Vii, they felt that the Sith Empire was a great civilizing power to lead to peace. After Vii went on a mission to the planet Sebaddon, he contacted Khamarr again and told her that neither the Empire or the Republic had possession of the world and they could take it during the war.
